is a town in the southeast of
Bunnik is a suburb of Utrecht, mostly inhabited by people working in the Uithof (which is the academic centre of Utrecht). Except for the fortress Bunnik isn't really a place to stop.

NL Spoorwegen from Utrecht Centraal. The Bunnik "station" is just a platform. There are no taxis, no services and the city bus doesn't even stop there.
Take the wijk bij Duurstede bus from Utrecht Centraal. It makes two stops in Bunnik.

value: , which is a nicely located pancake restaurant, just next to the Hostel.

content=Located in the woods on the East end of Utrecht, in Bunnik. The hostel is located in an very old building in the forest of the fortress "Rhijnauwen". Easy to reach by car (15 minutes from the center) or bike (25 minutes from the city), but not recommended if you plan to go clubbing all night, in which case you’ll want to stay in the city centre.
